channel.title: Rune-Legacy Revised is back! Better than ever! JOIN NOW!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/idwrom.jpg[/img]
New beginning, New adventure. This is what you all have been looking for, Rune-legacy Revised is back!. Better than ever join today don't miss out on the fun.
[B]Website/Forums - [url=http://rune-legacy-revised.com/]http://rune-legacy-revised.com/[/url][/B]
[B]WebClient - [url=http://rune-legacy-revised.com/webclient]http://rune-legacy-revised.com/webclient[/url][/B]
FEATURES!
- Daily community events and updates - IPB integrated forums - Pk, Skilling, Quest, Minigame & Boss server - All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption - Reward Shops, for Pking, Skilling, Voting, Slayer. Even an Honour Shop for great Pkers - Castle Wars with working Barricades, Explosives and Tinderbox - Great active skills including Hunter. - Optional Bank Pin + Bank Pin recovery feature for account safety. - Unique Quests designed only for Rune-Legacy - Full Music System & Sound to bring back the RS memories - Clue Scrolls offering great rewards - Greatly designed minigames only on Rune-Legacy (such as Barbarian Assault, Fishing Trawler, Castle Wars)
Hunting:
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/fz25ug.png[/img]
Items kept on-death:
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/103a4au.jpg[/img]
[CENTER]Drop Party! [/CENTER][video=youtube;BFmJUEjUUvo]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BFmJUEjUUvo[/video][/CENTER]

item.title: Rune-Legacy Revised is back! Better than ever! JOIN NOW!

item.description:
@YoCosmyn wrote:

Lol Eco ruined much[/quote]

Economy is perfectly fine. This drop party was done way back, Before the Official Release.

@YoCosmyn wrote:

[CENTER]

New beginning, New adventure. This is what you all have been looking for, Rune-legacy Revised is back!. Better than ever join today don’t miss out on the fun.

[B]Website/Forums - http://rune-legacy-revised.com/[/B]

[B]WebClient - http://rune-legacy-revised.com/webclient[/B]

FEATURES!

  • Daily community events and updates
  • IPB integrated forums
  • Pk, Skilling, Quest, Minigame & Boss server
  • All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption
  • Reward Shops, for Pking, Skilling, Voting, Slayer. Even an Honour Shop for great Pkers
  • Castle Wars with working Barricades, Explosives and Tinderbox
  • Great active skills including Hunter.
  • Optional Bank Pin + Bank Pin recovery feature for account safety.
  • Unique Quests designed only for Rune-Legacy
  • Full Music System & Sound to bring back the RS memories
  • Clue Scrolls offering great rewards
  • Greatly designed minigames only on Rune-Legacy (such as Barbarian Assault, Fishing Trawler, Castle Wars)
